author: Sean O'Kane
title: Some Tesla factory employees still had to work after the production shutdown
description: The local police department says Tesla is complying with a recent shelter-in-place order brought on by the novel coronavirus pandemic. But some factory workers still had to come in this week to finish processing cars for delivery, even as Tesla confirmed the …
content:
And two office employees have now tested positive for COVID-19
Photo by Sean OKane / The Verge
Local officials have confirmed that Tesla stopped making electric cars in California on Monday, March 23rd, in compliance with a shelter-in-place order brought on… [+5177 chars]
